title: For Sale or Trade T205, T222, T213-2 Others (Updated)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale or Trade T205, T222, T213-2 Others (Updated)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave Hornish
Refocusing over the last few months and finally got around to scanning some cards.  Please make sale or trade offers on any or all of these. I am looking for collector grade T206 in return trade.  Generally looking for presentable fronts, damaged backs OK. E-mail dsh46@aol.com

REULBACH NOW ON HOLD (10:30 AM 11/20) AND THE 41 PLAYBALL IS SPOKEN FOR.

I was going to send this for grading but figured I'd see what happens on BST first:

[IMG]http://i130.photobucket.com/albums/p280/dsh46/reulbachfrontt205.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i130.photobucket.com/albums/p280/dsh46/reulbahbackt205.jpg[/IMG]

These are generally in poorer shape, except for Indian Bob and the W514. The W514 has some light creasing in the upper left background.  Fatima and Coupon backs are shown.  Unscanned backs are: T202 endpiece (Hassan), T205 Sheckard (Polar Bear), T205 Doyle (Hassan), T207 Smith (Recruit 240).  The Smith is miscut and shows border of the name frame of the card above it. 

[IMG]http://i130.photobucket.com/albums/p280/dsh46/prewarpotpourri.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i130.photobucket.com/albums/p280/dsh46/backs.jpg[/IMG]
